title: Love Me...Leave Me Not
description: Ashley after being deemed an adult at 18 years by the government; arrives at a charity home for women in New Haven Connecticut. The home, helps women out of foster care to get career training and become independent. Being on the artistic side, Ashley is advised to meet Sam the Computer institute head in New Haven to get information on Graphic Design and animation. Sam falls for her without knowing her background. But as Ashley mistrust of men run deep, she manages to fly far away from him. But during the course of years feels that men like Sam are hard to find and in spite of resisting her feelings for him he had taken deep roots into her heart. She is willing to give up everything to get a second chance. But will Sam accept her?Show more Show less
author: nimmu
